parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

parameters.name: pagination.reverse
parameters.description: reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

get.summary: DisabledList returns a list of disabled message urls

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

reverse.description: reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.description:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if
there are no more results.

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

cosmos.circuit.v1.AccountResponse.description: AccountResponse is the response type for the Query/Account RPC method.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

cosmos.circuit.v1.AccountsResponse.description: AccountsResponse is the response type for the Query/Accounts RPC method.

cosmos.circuit.v1.DisabledListResponse.description: DisabledListResponse is the response type for the Query/DisabledList RPC method.

cosmos.circuit.v1.GenesisAccountPermissi.title: GenesisAccountPermissions is the account permissions for the circuit breaker in genesis

level.description: level is the level of permissions granted to this account.

limit_type_urls.description:
limit_type_urls is used with LEVEL_SOME_MSGS to limit the lists of Msg type
URLs that the account can trip. It is an error to use limit_type_urls with
a level other than LEVEL_SOME_MSGS.

cosmos.circuit.v1.Permissions.description:
Permissions are the permissions that an account has to trip
or reset the circuit breaker.

cosmos.circuit.v1.Permissions.Level.description:
Level is the permission level.

 - LEVEL_NONE_UNSPECIFIED: LEVEL_NONE_UNSPECIFIED indicates that the account will have no circuit
breaker permissions.
 - LEVEL_SOME_MSGS: LEVEL_SOME_MSGS indicates that the account will have permission to
trip or reset the circuit breaker for some Msg type URLs. If this level
is chosen, a non-empty list of Msg type URLs must be provided in
limit_type_urls.
 - LEVEL_ALL_MSGS: LEVEL_ALL_MSGS indicates that the account can trip or reset the circuit
breaker for Msg's of all type URLs.
 - LEVEL_SUPER_ADMIN: LEVEL_SUPER_ADMIN indicates that the account can take all circuit breaker
actions and can grant permissions to other accounts.
